::Greven::

Greven manages to avoid the club, finding that he was out of missiles
and throwing his missile launcher at Skullgrin.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Ya know Jer, I might just keep Surgital a little longer than I
wanted.  Hmm.....*thinks about it*  Nah!  Muahahaha!
> 
> IC: ::Triggerhappy/Skullgrin::
> 
>      Triggerhappy nodded at Megatron's orders.
> 
>       "Yes sir!" Triggerhappy said.
> 
>        Triggerhappy transformed to jet mode, then flew around the
Element, and fired 2 blasts from each photon cannon at it(that's 4
photon blasts I think.  If it's more, then just say 4 anyway)
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>        Skullgrin grinned(SkullGRIN-grinned?  hehe) at his masters
orders.
> 
>         "Yesss," Skullgrin said evilly.
> 
>          Skullgrin transformed to Pretender mode.  Although he was
dumber than a donkey, his strength was something that would be a good
match for the Terrorcons any day.  He also stood at a about a good 12
feet tall.  Skullgrin ran towards the first target he saw, Greven, and
took his big club and then attempted to smash it down and shatter
Greven's metallic skull.
